name: Glampire: Spinphony of the Night
description:
You are Glampire the Vampire. Glamorous as you are, you are still vulnerable to the sun. You must get back to your home before the sun has risen. But there are three fabulous foes who block your path. Use your trusty(?) Vampire Roulette to dispatch them before it is morning!

Controls:

-Spacebar: Stop/Start Roulette

This game was made for the Extra Credits Game Jam. Check it out over on: https://itch.io/jam/extra-credits-game-design-jam
